^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

DellTelemetryService.description: This is telemetryservice oem property schemas.
DellTelemetryService.longDescription: This is telemetryservice oem property schemas

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

D4D.description: The link to the d4d service.
D4D.longDescription: This property shall contain a link to the d4d service.

FQDDList.description: The FQDD list available for Telemetry Configuration (MetricReportDefinition).
FQDDList.longDescription: The value of this property is a DELL defined FQDDList.

SourceList.description: The SourceList available for Telemetry Configuration (MetricReportDefinition).
SourceList.longDescription: The value of this property is an available list of sources that can be retrieved for Telemetry.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Timestamp.description: The time in epoch when the metric is obtained. A management application can establish a time series of metric data by retrieving the instances of metric value and sorting them according to their timestamp.
Timestamp.longDescription: The value shall time when the metric value was obtained in epoch time. Note that this value might be different from the time when this instance is created.

Value.description: The metric value, as a string.
Value.longDescription: This property shall contain the metric value, as a string.

SubmitMetricValue.description: This is telemetryservice Action oem property schemas
SubmitMetricValue.longDescription: This is telemetryservice Action oem property schemas

ContextId.description: The Context Id is a user friendly way to read the metric source.
ContextId.longDescription: The value of this property is a Context Id of the metric source.

Label.description: The Label is a user friendly representation of the metric.
Label.longDescription: The value of this property is a friendly representation of the device description associated with the Metric Id.

MetricValues.description: This is Metric Values of the complex type .
MetricValues.longDescription: This is Metric Values of the complex type.

Source.description: This field shows the data source name that the metric value was obtained from.
Source.longDescription: The value of this property shows the data source name that the metric value was obtained from.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #DellTelemetryService.v1_2_0
